item.title: Animula Nook PC alpha test sign-ups now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Shrink together and find small wonders

Publisher Tencent Games and developer LilliLandia Games have announced an alpha test for “lilliputian world” fantasy life simulation game Animula Nook. Sign-ups are available now. The test will be available for PC via Steam.

Here are the details:

Alpha Test Essentials (Must-Read Before Applying)

  • Account Access: Facebook / Google Only
    • This test only supports login via Facebook or Google accounts.
    • Important Reminder: Please remember and safely keep the Facebook or Google account you use when logging in on the official website. This will be your sole credential for receiving access and logging into the game.
    • If you previously pre-registered on the Animula Nook website using X (Twitter) or Apple, you must log in again using Facebook or Google, re-confirm your pre-registration, and fill in the survey. Otherwise, you will not be able to obtain Alpha Test access. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
  • Device Binding Rules (Important)
    • First-Device Binding – Your account will be tied to the very first PC you use to log in to the game. Unbinding or switching devices is not supported.
    • Login Issues – If you cannot log in, it may be because your current device does not match the one bound to your account. Please switch back to your original bound device to access the game.
    • Kind Reminder – Please decide on your primary testing device before installing and logging in for the first time.
    • Only Valid Identity – Please remember and safely keep the Facebook or Google account you use to log in on the official website. This is your sole credential for receiving access and logging into the game.
    • Security Warning – To avoid unnecessary loss, please do not trust any information regarding account sharing, trading, or the sale of test installers. Protect your personal information and game assets.

PC Specs Check

A minimum specs check is required for this Alpha Test. Devices below the threshold will be unable to launch the game. Please review the “Recommended Specs” below and ensure your PC meets the requirements before applying.

Basic Test Information

  • Sign-Up Starts: February 3, 2026 at 6:30 p.m. PT / 9:30 p.m. ET
  • Sign-Up Link: AnimulaNook.com
  • Sign-Up Deadline and Test Start Time: To be announced soon. Please follow our official channels for the latest updates:
    • Discord
    • X (Twitter)
  • Platform: Steam (PC only)
    • Note: This test is exclusive to PC via Steam and features a “First-Device Binding” mechanism. If you find yourself unable to log in, it may be because the current device does not match the one originally bound to your account. We recommend checking your device and switching back to the PC you used for your initial login. For more details, please refer to the “Alpha Test Essentials” section above.
  • Supported Languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
  • Test Type: Limited, Data-wipe, In-game purchases disabled
  • Note: Participation is limited to a fixed number of players. There are no in-game purchases. All game data (including accounts, characters, progress, and items) will be cleared after the test ends.

Recommended PC Specs

  1. This Alpha Test only supports PC.
  2. Before applying, please verify your hardware against the specs below to avoid issues like heavy lag or failure to run the game.
  3. Since optimization is still in progress, we strongly recommend using a PC that meets or exceeds the Recommended Specs to ensure a smoother experience.

Important: Please note that this Alpha Test includes a minimum specs check. Devices below the threshold may be unable to launch or enter the game. If you encounter a hardware-related warning during login, it means your current device does not meet the minimum requirements. In such cases, please review the specs below and consider switching to a compatible device.

We are continuously working on performance optimization and compatibility. Our goal is to ensure that more Wishweavers can enjoy the world of Animula Nook on a wider range of devices in the future.

Recommended Specs

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • CPU: Intel Core i5 (11th Gen) / AMD Ryzen 5 5000 series or equivalent
  • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT / Intel Arc A750 or better
  • RAM: 16 GB
  • DirectX Version: 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Audio: Windows-compatible sound device
  • Note: We recommend installing the game on an SSD for a smoother experience.

Animula Nook will be available for PlayStation 5, Switch 2, PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, and Mac. A release date has yet to be announced.

item.title: Game Boy – Nintendo Classics add Balloon Kid, Yoshi
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Two new games join the lineup.

The Game Boy – Nintendo Classics app has added Balloon Kid and Yoshi, Nintendo announced.

Here is an overview of each game, via their boxes:

Balloon Kid

Take to the skies with Balloon Kid.

You’ll have to think light as you float across the most unfriendly skies around. Nasty flying crea-tures will test your piloting skills, but don’t go too low because even nastier enemies await you on the ground. Get extra bonuses by gathering all the balloons you can for a series of challenging tests of skill.

Take a big gulp of courage and give Alice a hand as she searches for her missing brother.

Play alone or use your Video Link cable to race against a friend. Either way, Balloon Kid will give you a lift.

Yoshi

An airborne puzzle invasion!

It’s raining Goombas, Bloobers and Boo Buddies! You have to help Mario cope with the airborne invasion! As the critters fall, catch then on trays. Switch and shuffle to save the day! Stack two of a kind and they both disappear. Or, capture the whole bunch in-between egg shells… When the egg shells match, out hatches Yoshi and up goes your score!

The action heats up as the characters fall faster and faster. If your piles get too high, the game is over. Choose your difficulty level and play for a high score or challenge a friend in a head-to-head hatch-off!

If you like Dr. Mario, but you’re ready for a whole new kind of challenge, you’ll love this quick-shuffle action puzzle game!
